text: Pierre Max Rosenberg (born 13 April 1936 in Paris) is a French art historian, curator, and professor. Rosenberg is the honorary president a director of the Musée du Louvre in Paris, and since 1995, he has held the 23rd seat of the Académie française. He was Slade Professor of Fine Art at the University of Cambridge in 1987. ==References== ==Other websites== * Académie française profile Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Art historians Category:French historians Category:Writers from Paris
title: Pierre Rosenberg
